comment:
Interested in seeing this heat mat. Seems like it would work better than the last time I did this in the middle of summer. Also, did you actually cool to 85 and then turn on the heat mat? Just so you wouldn't shock the lacto I suppose?
Excited to try this one.
I did cool it to 85ish.  It still took a few days for the lacto to take off. Also if i were to do this again i would drop the wheat a bit
